TopicTitle: What is the oldest active mod?

Articles.Content: What mod has survived the longest.

That might well be [KW Rocketry](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/2448-0-16-KW-Rocketry-v0-5), though there are parts of [NovaPunch](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/2222-v1-1-Lunar-Lander-Parts) from before then.
Are we including mods that later became part of the stock game ? ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
